```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

Examples from [reddit](https://www.reddit.com/r/rstats/comments/lrobtx/can_you_chain_nondplyr_verbs/)

```{r, eval=FALSE}
df$Date <- as.Date(df$Date, format = "%m/%d/%Y")
```

is equivalent with:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
mutate(Date = as.Date(Date, format = "%m/%d/%Y") %>%
```

```{r}
mtcars %>% .$cyl %>% unique()
mtcars %>% pull(cyl) %>% unique()
mtcars %>% select(cyl) %>% unique()
```
